text: Lalaloopsy is a children's television series based on the Lalaloopsy dolls from MGA Entertainment. The series was ordered on February 11, 2013 for a spring 2013 premiere. It premiered on Nickelodeon on March 29, 2013 and ended on September 14, 2015, with a total of 52 episodes over the course of 2 seasons. ==Series overview== ==Episodes== ===Season 1 (2013–14)=== ===Season 2 (2014–15)=== ==References== ==External links== * Category:Lists of American children's animated television series episodes pl:Lalaloopsy#Spis odcinków
